h1_title: How to Find the Five Skandhas and Unlock a Secret Boss
h2_title: How to Find the Skandha of Thought
content: Jump down there and follow the cave system, until you're back outside, then continue up the stairs and along the path. Turn right and head through the corridor to emerge on another cliff that's covered in snow.
promot:

The content is as follows:
Jump down there and follow the cave system, until you're back outside, then continue up the stairs and along the path. Turn right and head through the corridor to emerge on another cliff that's covered in snow.
